quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易混淆"compulsive"与形近词"compulsory"（义务的/强制的），或仅根据"obsessive"（着迷的）和"compulsive"（强迫的）字面意思，未识别其为心理障碍术语"强迫症"。
quiz_item.sentence: Sarah spends hours every day checking if the doors are locked again and again, which her doctor says is a symptom of **obsessive-compulsive disorder**.

option.definition: 因义务性着迷导致的行为障碍
对某事物过度痴迷的强制状态
由强迫性习惯引起的身体疾病
